00055 void GenericDataTest_FileIndependent::setUp()
00056 {
00057         // Create generic data header
00058         data = new GenericData;
00059 
00060         data->Header().SetFilename("../data/test.file.data_dat");
00061 
00062         header = new GenericDataHeader;
00063         header->SetFileCreationTime(L"20040823T17:06:00Z");
00064 //      header->SetFileCreationTime(DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString().c_str()); // change time to wstring?
00065         header->SetFileTypeId(INTENSITY_DATA_TYPE);
00066 //      header->SetFileId(AffymetrixGuid::GenerateNewGuid());
00067         header->SetFileId("someuniquedatfileid");
00068         header->SetLocale(L"en-US");
00069 
00070         // Create parent array file header
00071         parent = new GenericDataHeader;
00072         parent->SetFileTypeId(ARRAY_TYPE_IDENTIFIER);
00073         parent->SetLocale(L"en-US");
00074 //      parent->SetFileId(AffymetrixGuid::GenerateNewGuid());
00075         parent->SetFileId("someuniquearrayfileid");
00076         parent->SetFileCreationTime(L"20031225T18:23:00Z");
00077 
00078         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00079         nvt.SetName(ARRAY_ID_PARAM_NAME);
00080         nvt.SetValueAscii("arrayidis17");
00081         parent->AddNameValParam(nvt);
00082 
00083         header->AddParent(*parent);
00084 
00085         // Add GenericDataHeader to the FileHeader
00086         data->Header().SetGenericDataHdr(*header);
00087 
00088         // Create DataGroupHeaders
00089         dch = new DataGroupHeader;
00090         dch->SetName(L"Default");
00091 
00092         // Create DataSetHeaders
00093         dphPI = new DataSetHeader;
00094         dphPI->SetName(L"pixel intensity");
00095         ParameterNameValueType param;
00096         param.SetName(L"Scanner");
00097         param.SetValueText(L"M10");
00098         dphPI->AddNameValParam(param);
00099         dphPI->AddUShortColumn(L"Intensity");
00100         dphPI->SetRowCnt(1);
00101 
00102         dphGrid = new DataSetHeader;
00103         dphGrid->SetName(L"grid coordinates");
00104         param.SetName(L"Corner Pattern");
00105         param.SetValueText(L"Checkerboard");
00106         dphGrid->AddNameValParam(param);
00107         dphGrid->AddUShortColumn(L"GridULX");
00108         dphGrid->AddUShortColumn(L"GridULY");
00109         dphGrid->AddUShortColumn(L"GridURX");
00110         dphGrid->AddUShortColumn(L"GridURY");
00111 
00112         dphGrid->AddUShortColumn(L"GridLRX");
00113         dphGrid->AddUShortColumn(L"GridLRY");
00114         dphGrid->AddUShortColumn(L"GridLLX");
00115         dphGrid->AddUShortColumn(L"GridLLY");
00116         dphGrid->SetRowCnt(1);
00117 
00118         // Add DataGroupHeaders
00119         dch->AddDataSetHdr(*dphPI);
00120         dch->AddDataSetHdr(*dphGrid);
00121 
00122         data->Header().AddDataGroupHdr(*dch);
00123 }

00126 {
00127         delete data;
00128         delete header;
00129         delete parent;
00130         delete dch;
00131         delete dphPI;
00132         delete dphGrid;
00133 }

00138         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);

00141 void GenericDataTest_FileIndependent::testproperty_Header()
00142 {
00143         FileHeader& fhdr = data->Header();
00144         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fhdr.GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileId() == header->GetFileId());
00145 }

00147 void GenericDataTest_FileIndependent::testmethod_DataSet_ByIndex()
00148 {
00149         DataSet* dp = data->DataSet(0,0);
00150         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 != dp);
00151         dp->Delete();
00152         dp = data->DataSet(0,1);
00153         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 != dp);
00154         dp->Delete();
00155         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(data->DataSet(1,0), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataGroupNotFoundException);
00156         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(data->DataSet(0,2), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotFoundException);
00157         // TODO: Add more asserts to make sure that I am getting back the right data set.
00158 }
00159 
00160 void GenericDataTest_FileIndependent::testmethod_DataSet_ByName()
00161 {
00162         GenericData d;
00163         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(data->DataSet(L"none", dphPI->GetName()), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataGroupNotFoundException);
00164         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(data->DataSet(L"Default", L"none"), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataSetNotFoundException);
00165         DataSet* dp = data->DataSet(dch->GetName(), dphPI->GetName());
00166         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 != dp);
00167         dp->Delete();
00168         dp = data->DataSet(dch->GetName(), dphGrid->GetName());
00169         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 != dp);
00170         dp->Delete();
00171         // TODO: Add more asserts to make sure that I am getting back the right data set.
00172 }

00174 void GenericDataTest_FileIndependent::testmethod_FindDataSetHeader_ByName()
00175 {
00176         const DataSetHeader* dph = data->FindDataSetHeader(0, dphPI->GetName());
00177         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 == dph);
00178         dph = data->FindDataSetHeader(dch, L"none");
00179         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 == dph);
00180         dph = data->FindDataSetHeader(dch, dphPI->GetName());
00181         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 != dph);
00182         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph->GetName() == dphPI->GetName());
00183         dph = data->FindDataSetHeader(dch, dphGrid->GetName());
00184         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 != dph);
00185         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph->GetName() == dphGrid->GetName());
00186 }
00187 
00188 void GenericDataTest_FileIndependent::testmethod_FindDataSetHeader_ByIndex()
00189 {
00190         const DataSetHeader* dph = data->FindDataSetHeader(0, 0);
00191         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 == dph);
00192         dph = data->FindDataSetHeader(dch, 2);
00193         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 == dph);
00194         dph = data->FindDataSetHeader(dch, 0);
00195         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 != dph);
00196         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph->GetName() == dphPI->GetName());
00197         dph = data->FindDataSetHeader(dch, 1);
00198         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 != dph);
00199         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dph->GetName() == dphGrid->GetName());
00200 }

00203 {
00204         std::vector<std::wstring> names;
00205         data->DataGroupNames(names);
00206         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(names.size() == 1);
00207         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(names[0] == dch->GetName());

00234 void GenericDataTest_FileIndependent::testmethod_Clear()
00235 {
00236         int32_t count = data->DataGroupCnt();
00237         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(count == 1);
00238         data->Clear();
00239         count = data->DataGroupCnt();
00240         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(count == 0);
00241 }

00243 void GenericDataTest_FileIndependent::testmethod_DataSetCnt()
00244 {
00245         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(data->DataSetCnt(L"none"), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataGroupNotFoundException);
00246         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->DataSetCnt(L"Default") == 2);
00247         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(data->DataSetCnt(1), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataGroupNotFoundException);
00248         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data->DataSetCnt(0) == 2);
00249 }
00250 
00251 void GenericDataTest_FileIndependent::testmethod_DataSetNames()
00252 {
00253         // By name
00254         std::vector<std::wstring> names;
00255         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(data->DataSetNames(L"none", names), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataGroupNotFoundException);
00256         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(data->DataSetNames(L"Default", names));
00257         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(names.size() == 2);
00258         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(names[0] == dphPI->GetName());
00259         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(names[1] == dphGrid->GetName());
00260 
00261         // By index
00262         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_THROW(data->DataSetNames(1, names), affymetrix_calvin_exceptions::DataGroupNotFoundException);
00263         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(data->DataSetNames(0, names));
00264         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(names.size() == 2);
00265         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(names[0] == dphPI->GetName());
00266         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(names[1] == dphGrid->GetName());
00267 }

00269 void GenericDataTest_FileIndependent::testmethod_FindDataGroupHeader_ByName()
00270 {
00271         const DataGroupHeader* dch = data->FindDataGroupHeader(L"none");
00272         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 == dch);
00273         dch = data->FindDataGroupHeader(L"default");
00274         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 == dch);
00275         dch = data->FindDataGroupHeader(L"Default");
00276         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 != dch);
00277         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(dch->GetName() == L"Default");
00278 }

00280 void GenericDataTest_FileIndependent::testmethod_FindDataGroupHeader_ByIndex()
00281 {
00282         const DataGroupHeader* dch = data->FindDataGroupHeader(1);
00283         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0 == dch);
00284         dch = data->FindDataGroupHeader(0);
